title: Not able to connect to home wifi with Pixel4
content:
I have troubles in connecting to the home router. Settings are: wifi= 5GHz, channel 40, SSID Broadcast = Yes, AP Isolation = No, Password WPA = xxxx, Management Frame Protection = Disabled, WPS enabled = No.
Many other devices connect withou problems to this network.
I have no problem in connecting with pixel to the wifi from another mobile phone used as a router.

Any suggestions of which setting in the router can be creating the problem?
